A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a pile of poo this film is. There are so many plot holes my 10yr old came out of the cinema wondering what the last 2.5 hours were about. TFA wasn't the greatest Star Wars but what it did do was provide a good base foundation to build this film on. TLJ shits all over that\, killing off cool characters before their time and destroying those characters left alive. The whole time trying to push a political agenda. Appalling story line\, lazy writing and questionable motives.
